entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sarnia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:15 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 12:41 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 8.1°C
Pressure: 99.1 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 7.7°C
Wind: SSW 21 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Showers ending this afternoon then cloudy. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 this afternoon. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
